name: Impossible Geometry
description: Impossible Geometry is challenging platformer inspired by 2 amazing games! We have tried hard to take best of two worlds and bring you impossible challenges. You have deserved them!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows xp,vista,7,8 or 10 Processor: 1ghz or faster Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated or better Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows xp,vista,7,8 or 10 Processor: 1ghz or faster Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated or better Storage: 100 MB available space
